byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Paris, and Kimiko de Freytas-Tamura and Lilia Blaise from Brussels.

lead_paragraph: A man identified in the Belgian press as Fayçal Cheffou has been accused of terrorist murders. The authorities say he was deeply involved in the plot.

headline.print_headline: Brussels Suspect Charged With Terrorist Murders
headline.main: New Brussels Attack Suspect Is Charged, Prosecutors Say

snippet: A man identified in the Belgian press as Fayçal Cheffou has been accused of terrorist murders. The authorities say he was deeply involved in the plot.
abstract: Federal prosecutors in Belgium announce arrest of Faycal Cheffou in connection with Brussels terror attack, charging him with array of terrorism-related crimes.
